channel.title: Dream Scape 317 Development
channel.description:
[ul][center][shadow=red,left][size=24pt]Dream Scape Development Thread[/size][/center]
[center][b][size=15pt]Forums[/size][/b][/center] [center]Under Construction[/center]
[Center][b][size=13pt]Our Team[/size][/b] [/center] [Center]â€¢Barrick/Parker[/center]
[center]Looking for a Team, Need a Coder, Forum Developer, and Advertiser! Msn - elfbow@live.com[/center]
[center][b][size=15pt]Features[/size][/b] ~100% Fast EXP Rate! ~100% All perfect special attacks! ~100% 2 Different Prayer switches! ~100% Fully working Corporeal Beast! ~100% Fully working Perfect player Killing! ~100% Fully working PvP Area with real rs drops! ~100% Fully working Hybrid switches! ~100% Fully working Perfect PKing! ~100% Fully working Chaotic Weapons! ~100% Fully working Staff of Light! ~100% Fully working Minigames! ~100% Fully working Pest Control! ~100% Fully working spirit shields! ~100% Fully working Turmoil! ~100% Fully working Webclient! and and and....[/center]
[center][b]Combat[/b] [list][*][COLOR=Orange]All special attacks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Clipping[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]Multi & Single zones[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Wilderness levels (to attack players)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Items lost on death (besides the 3 ones you keep)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Auto Retaliation (toggle on and off)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Specials[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Correct timers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Equipment effects (barrows)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Weapon degrading (barrows)[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/magic.png[/img] [b]Mage[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Ancient spells[/COLOR][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Dust[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Ice[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Shadow[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Smoke[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Teleports[/COLOR][/list] [*][COLOR=Red]Clipping[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Modern spells[/COLOR][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Alchemy[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Basic combat spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Binding spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Bones to bananas[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Bones to peaches[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Charge[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Curses[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Enchanting jewelery[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]God spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Iban blast[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Slayer dart[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Teleblock[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]Teleports[/COLOR][/list] [*][COLOR=Red]Staffs giving unlimited runes[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/ranged.png[/img] [b]Range[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]All special attacks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Clipping[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Crystal bow[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Throwables[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/prayer.png[/img] [b]Prayer[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Green]All prayers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Bone burying[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Ectofuntus[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Prayer draining[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Headicons[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/agility.png[/img] [b]Agility[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]All obstacles[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Ape Atoll course[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Brimhaven course[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Gnome course[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Wilderness course[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/cooking.png[/img] [b]Cooking[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Brewing[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Cakes[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Cooking gauntlets[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Correct burn chance[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Dairy[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Lowers chance to burn on Cook's Assistant range[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Fish[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Meat[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Miscellaneous[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Stews[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Pies[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Pizzas[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Potato Toppings[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Vegetables[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Wine[/color][/list] [*][img]http://i.imgur.com/tdedh.png[/img] [b]Crafting[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Broodoo shields[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Dragonleather crafting[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Leather crafting[/color] [*][COLOR=Orange]Jewelry[/color][list] [*][COLOR=Green]Gem Cutting[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Stringing amulets[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Jewelry making (using furnace and molds)[/color][/list] [*][COLOR=Red]Weaving[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/farming.png[/img] [b]Farming[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Allotments[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Amulet of Nature[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Bushes[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Compost bin[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Flowers[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Herbs[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Hops[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Fruit trees[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Protecting crops[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Specials[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Tool leprechauns[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Trees[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/firemaking.png[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]All logs[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Can't light fires in banks[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Can't light fires on objects[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Clipping[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Colored fires[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Fires burn out and leave ashes[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/fishing.png[/img] [b]Fishing[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Green]All fish can be caught[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Bait checking[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Equipment checking[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Fishing spots around the world[/color] [*][COLOR=Orange]Moving fishing spots[/color] [*]Whirlpools[/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/fletching.png[/img] [b]Fletching[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Orange]Arrow making[/color] [*][COLOR=Orange]Bow making[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Darts[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/herblore.png[/img] [b]Herblore[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Green]All potions[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Grinding materials[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Cleaning Herbs[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Pouring together doses[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Weapon poisoning[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/mining.png[/img] [b]Mining[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Green]All ores[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]All pickaxes[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Exploding rocks[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Flying pick head[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Gems[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Rock golem[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Rocks deplete and regenerate[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/runecraft.png[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Green]Abyss[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]All runes can be made[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Entering altars[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Multiple runes[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Talisman location finding[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Tiara making[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Tiaras give the enter option on mysterious ruins[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/slayer.png[/img] [b]Slayer[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]All slayer masters[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]All slayer monsters working correctly[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]All task level difficulties[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/smithing.png[/img] [b]Smithing[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Green]Smithing[/COLOR][/list] [*][COLOR=Green]Smelting[/COLOR][/ul]
[*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/thieving.png[/img] [b]Thieving[/b] [ul][*][COLOR=Red]Blackjacking[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]Correct caught chance[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Disarming traps[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Picking locks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Pickpocketing[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Stalls[/COLOR][/ul]
[*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/woodcutting.png[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b] [ul][*][COLOR=Green]All axes[/color] [*][COLOR=Orange]All trees cuttable[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Bird nests[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Stumps with respawning[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Tree spirit[/color][/ul]
[*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/minigame.png[/img] [b]Minigames[/b] [ul][*][COLOR=Red]Barrows[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Castle Wars[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Duel Arena[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Fight Pits[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Fishing Trauler[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Gnome Ball[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Gnome Delivery[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Mage Arena[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Mage Training Arena[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Pest Control[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Pyramid Plunder[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Treasure Trails[/COLOR][/ul] [/list]

Msn - elfbow@live.com[/center]

and and andâ€¦[/center]
